___spatialRepresentation.description: Method used to spatially represent geographic information.

___supplementalInfo.description: Any other descriptive information about the dataset.

___pointOfContact.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations that may be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource.

___contactId.description: Identifier matching a contactId in the main contact array.

___organizationMembers.description: Identifies individuals that have an association with an organization contact.

___roleExtent.description: The area or period of time for which the role is valid.

___party.description: Identifies all the contacts associated with the role.

___role.description: Function performed by the contact in the current context.

___otherResourceLocale.description: Alternate localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource.

$eref.description: Localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource being described.

___language.description: Language(s) used within the resource. Should be a valid ISO 639-3 code.

___country.description: Designation of the specific country of the locale language(ISO 3166-1).

___characterSet.description: Full name of the character encoding standard used by the resource(see http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).

___graphicOverview.description: Provides a path or link to images, maps, flow charts, models, etc. that illustrate the resource.

$eref.description: Provides a path or link to images, maps, flow charts, models, etc. that illustrate the resource.
$eref.title: graphic

___fileConstraint.description: Identifies, legal, security, and other constraint requirements associated with use and distribution of the graphic

___fileType.description: The format in which the illustration is encoded such as GIF, JPEG, PBM, PS, TIFF.

___fileName.description: Name of the file that contains a graphic describing the resource.

___constraint.description: Provides information about constraints to the use of the resource.

anyOf.title: security required if type is security
legal required if type is legal

_88securityConstraint.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the resource or metadata for national security or similar security concerns.

___userNote.description: Explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource or metadata.

___classification.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the resource or metadata.

___classificationSystem.description: Name of the classification system associated with a security constraint.

___handlingDescription.description: Additional description regarding the security handling of the resource or metadata.

_88legalConstraint.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata.

___useConstraint.description: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource or metadata.

___accessConstraint.description: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource or metadata.

___otherConstraint.description: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata.

___useLimitation.description: Limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource or metadata. For example, "not to be used for navigation".

___responsibleParty.description: Entity responsible for the resource constraint

___graphic.description: Graphic or symbol indicating the constraint

___reference.description: Citation for the limitation or constraint

___scope.description: temporal extent and or level of the application of the constraint restrictions.

___releasability.description: Information concerning the parties to who the resource can or cannot be released.

___coverageDescription.description: Details about the content of a raster(grid) resource.

$eref.description: Details about the content of a raster resource.

___attributeGroup.description: Information about groups of attributes describing a coverage.

___processingLevelCode.description: Code that identifies the level of radiometric and geometric processing that has been applied.

$eref.description: Information on the taxa (1 or more) included in the data set, including keywords, taxonomic system and coverage information, and taxonomic classification system.

_88taxonomicClassification.description: Information about the range of taxa addressed in the data set or collection. NOTE It is recommended that one provide information starting from the taxonomic rank of kingdom, to a level which reflects the data set or collection being documented.
_88taxonomicClassification.title: taxonomicClassification

___taxonomicName.description: Taxonomic rank value of the taxon being described.

___taxonomicLevel.description: Name of the taxonomic rank for which the taxonValue is provided. Example: "Kingdom", "Division", "Phylum", "Subphylum", "SuperClass", "Class", "SubClass", "InfraClass", "Superorder", "Order", "Suborder", "Infraorder", "Superfamily", "Family", "Subfamily", "Tribe", "Subtribe", "Genus", "Species".

___commonName.description: Specification of applicable common names. These common names may be general descriptions of a group of organisms if appropriate (e.g. insects, vertebrate, grasses, waterfowl, vascular plants, etc.).

___taxonomicSystemId.description: The ID assigned by the taxonomic system to the taxonomicRank.

___citation.description: Information about the classification system or authority used.

___modifications.description: Description of any modifications or exceptions made to the classification system or authority used.

_88voucher.description: Information on the types of specimen, the repository, and the individuals who identified the vouchers.

___specimen.description: Word or phrase describing the type of specimen collected (e.g. 'herbarium specimens', 'blood samples', 'photographs', 'individuals', or 'batches').

___repository.description: Information about the curator or contact person and/or agency responsible for the specimens.

___identificationReference.description: Information on any non-authoritative materials (e.g. field guides) useful for reconstructing the actual process.

___voucher.description: Information on the types of specimen, the repository, and the individuals who identified the vouchers.

___generalScope.description: Description of the range of taxa addressed in the data set or collection. For example, "all vascular plants were identified to family or species, mosses and lichens were identified as moss or lichen".

___identificationCompleteness.description: Information concerning the proportions and treatment of unidentified materials (i.e. materials sent to experts, and not yet determined); estimates of the importance, and identities of misidentifications, uncertain determinations, synonyms or other incorrect usages; taxa not well treated or requiring further work; and expertise of field workers.

___taxonomicSystem.description: Information about the taxonomic classification system used.

___identificationProcedure.description: Description of the methods used for taxonomic identification. Could include specimen processing, comparison with museum materials, keys, and key characters, chemical or genetic analyses, etc.

___observer.description: Information about the individual(s) responsible for the identification(s) of the specimens or sightings. etc.

___referenceSystemIdentifier.description: The reference system identifier or definition.

___referenceSystemWKT.description: Well Known Text (WKT) for spatial reference system.

___resourceMaintenance.description: Information about the maintenance of the resource.

$eref.description: Information about the maintenance of a resource.

___frequency.description: Describes the frequency of additions and updates made to a resource.

___scope.description: Type of resource to which the maintenance information applies.

___note.description: Notes regarding the maintenance of the resource.

___contact.description: Contact information for the maintainer of the resource.

___resourceType.description: Identifies the type of resource, such as: a dataset, study, publication, etc.

___name.description: The name of the resource component.

___type.description: The type of resource(or component of a resource) being described.

___resourceFormat.description: Provides a description of the format of the resource.

___amendmentNumber.description: Amendment number of the format version.

___technicalPrerequisite.description: Description of any technical capabilities that the consumer must have to use the data set in the form(s) provided by the distributor.

___compressionMethod.description: Recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied.

___formatSpecification.description: Citation of the specification for the format.

___spatialResolution.description: Information about the scale of the geographic extent.

___scaleFactor.description: Scale of geographic extent expressed in a hardcopy map scale fraction (denominator).

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > coordrep > absres

___abscissaResolutionX.description: The (nominal) minimum distance between the 'x' or column values of two adjacent points, expressed in Planar Distance.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > coordrep > ordres

___ordinateResolutionY.description: The (nominal) minimum distance between the 'y' or column values of two adjacent points, expressed in Planar Distance.

___unitOfMeasure.description: The units of the ordinate and abscissa axis.

_88bearingDistanceResolution.description: The method of encoding the position of a point by measuring its distance and direction (azimuth angle) from another point.

___distanceUnitOfMeasure.description: The units for the distance resolution.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > distbrep > bearrefm

___bearingReferenceMeridian.description: The axis from which the bearing is measured.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > distbrep > bearunit

___bearingUnitOfMeasure.description: The units of measure used for angles.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > distbrep > bearrefd

___bearingReferenceDirection.description: The direction from which the bearing is measured.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > distbrep > bearres

___bearingResolution.description: The minimum angle measurable between two points, expressed in Bearing Units of measure.

FGDC CSDGM: spref > horizsys > planar > planci > distbrep > distres

___distanceResolution.description: The minimum distance measurable between two points, expressed Planar Distance Units of measure.

_88geographicResolution.description: The quantities of latitude and longitude which define the position of a point on the Earth's surface with respect to a reference spheroid.

___unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used for the latitude and longitude values.

___latitudeResolution.description: The minimum difference between two adjacent latitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.

___longitudeResolution.description: The minimum difference between two adjacent longitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.

___keyword.description: Provides category keywords, their type, and reference source.
Array of ISO Topic Category keywords.

___keywordType.description: ISO Topic Category keywords. Keywords must match list defined by ISO 19115.

___keyword.description: Commonly used word(s) or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject.
Commonly used word(s) or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject.

___thesaurus.description: Name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords.

___keywordType.description: A code, or concept, that defines the subject matter used to group similar keywords.

_88series.description: Information about the series, or aggregate resource, to which a resource belongs.
_88series.title: series

___responsibleParty.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the cited resource.

___alternateTitle.description: Alias by which the cited resource is known.

___otherCitationDetails.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere.

ISO 19115-2: CI_Citation > citedResponsibleParty > CI_ResponsibleParty > contact > CI_Contact > onlineResource > CI_OnlineResource

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the citation.

___graphic.description: Online graphic associated with the citation

___presentationForm.description: The form that the resource is presented, such as: digital map, digital document, etc.

___title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known.

___identifier.description: Identifier for the resource in the context of the citation.

___date.description: Date referenced to the cited resource.

___resourceUsage.description: Description of ways in which the resource is currently or has been used.

$eref.description: Description of ways in which the resource is currently or has been used.

___temporalExtent.description: Date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series.

___documentedIssue.description: Citation of a description of known issues associated with the resource along with proposed solutions if available.

___additionalDocumentation.description: Publications that describe usage of data.

___userContactInfo.description: Identification of the persons and/or organizations that are using the resource.

___specificUsage.description: A brief description about how the resource is being used.

___userDeterminedLimitation.description: A brief description of applications, determined by the user, for which the resource is not suitable.

___spatialRepresentationType.description: Format of the resource geographic extent, such as: vector, grid, etc.

___extent.description: Information about the geographic, vertical, and temporal extent of the resource. A resource may have multiple extents.

$eref.description: Information about the geographic, vertical, and temporal extent of a resource.

___verticalExtent.description: An array of objects each describing a vertical boundary comprising all or a portion of the resource.

___temporalExtent.description: An array of objects each describing a temporal boundary comprising all or a portion of the resource.

___environmentDescription.description: Description of the dataset in the producer's processing environment, including items such as the software, the computer, the computer operating system, file name, and the dataset size.

___temporalResolution.description: Information about the termporal period of the resource.

$eref.description: Object for collecting information about a duration or period of time.

___topicCategory.description:

General theme keyword of the resource, such as: oceans, biota atmosphere, etc.

oneOf.description: A timePeriod with a startDateTime and/or endDateTime.
oneOf.title: dateTime

___startDateTime.description: Starting date, or date and time.

___endDateTime.description: Ending date, or date and time.

oneOf.description: A timePeriod with a startGeologicAge and/or endGeologicAge.
oneOf.title: geologicAge

___endGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the end of an event or period in geologic time.

___startGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the beginning of an event or period in geologic time.

$eref.description: A span of time represented by a starting date-time and an ending date-time.

_88timeInterval.description: Defines a length of time in specific units.

___units.description: The unit of time for the interval.

_88duration.description: Object for collecting information about a duration or period of time.

___description.description: A brief description providing relevant information about the time period.

___periodName.description: Names associated with the time period.

___id.description: A unique identifier for a time period.

___timePeriod.description: Time period for the resource, e.g. project start and end date(s).

___purpose.description: A summary of intentions for which the resource was created.

___abstract.description: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource.

___credit.description: A narrative identification of additional resources credited for the resource.

___shortAbstract.description: A short description of the resource. Max of 300 characters.
